column4: This is going to sound like a dumb question, but can someone remind me how I can "apt-get source" from a different version other than my current OS, that is, I'm running Feisty and I want to apt-get source from Hardy.
I am not compiling it, I just need to get the source.
that will get you access to a source file in that repo but if you are not going to compile what are you going to do with it
